symptoms.name: Duck noises
symptoms.notes: Quack quack! Treated by tangling a string of fairy lights with the human hair of a punk.

symptoms.name: Horns
symptoms.notes: Pointy things emanating from the skull. Highly dangerous.

symptoms.name: Lizard tail
symptoms.notes: Upsets patient's sense of balance. Treat with llama flesh, or administer a fat doob.

symptoms.name: Terrible moustache
symptoms.notes: When no razor is available, use a rodent paste or the juice of one toad.

symptoms.name: Laser eyes
symptoms.notes: Will burn through solid steel. Apply syphilitic ants to eyes immediately.

symptoms.name: Short legs
symptoms.notes: Easily cured by insects in any form.

symptoms.name: Elongated tongue
symptoms.notes: A short burst of pug wrinkles has proven to retract the tongue.

symptoms.name: Firebreathing
symptoms.notes: Can occur after eating very spicy food. Apply rag over mouth to cure - also treated by toad or armadillo testicles.
